@graph.name: VGP assembly: training workflow
@graph.description:
VGP assembly tutorial

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Vertebrate genome assembly using HiFi, Bionano and Hi-C data - Step by Step](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/assembly/tutorials/vgp_genome_assembly/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
